title: Hezekiah’s Illness and Pride
summary: Hezekiah becomes mortally ill but prays, and God adds 15 years to his life. He foolishly shows off his wealth to Babylonian envoys, prompting Isaiah to prophesy Babylon’s future conquest of Judah.

faq.question: What miracle did God do for Hezekiah?
faq.answer: He healed him and caused the shadow to go backward as a sign.

faq.question: What mistake did Hezekiah make?
faq.answer: He proudly displayed all his treasures to the Babylonians.
